item.title: ICE Asks Companies About ‘Ad Tech and Big Data’ Tools It Could Use in Investigations
item.description: A new federal filing from ICE demonstrates how commercial tools are increasingly being considered by the government for law enforcement and surveillance.

item.title: OpenAI Partners with Major Government Contractor to ‘Transform Federal Operations’
item.description: Leidos is a prolific government contractor with a "strong relationship with DHS."

item.title: UFC 324 live stream: how to watch Gaethje vs Pimblett, start time, preview, full card
item.description: As UFC makes Paramount Plus debut with much-anticipated main event, follow our guide to watch a UFC 324 live stream online from anywhere.
